funFacts.sk: Vzor so strapcami hrozna odkazuje na vÃ­no ako symbol Kristovej krvi. PodobnÃ½ ornament nÃ¡jdete aj na triptychoch v SmreÄanoch Äi na tabuli v Ljublane.
funFacts.en: The patterns with bunches of grapes refer to wine as a symbol of Christâ€™s blood. You can find a similar reference in the triptychs in SmreÄany or on the panel in Ljubljana.

meta.imgSrcInstitution: Budapest, SzeÌpmuÌ‹veÌszeti MuÌzeum / Magyar Nemzeti GaleÌria, ReÌgi Magyar GyuÌˆjtemeÌny, 184.a

funFacts.sk: GranÃ¡tovÃ© jablkÃ¡ alebo ananÃ¡sy sme sÃ­ce naÅ¾ivo nikdy nevideli, no dodÃ¡vajÃº oltÃ¡ru ten pravÃ½ luxusnÃ½ tÃ³n. Tipujem, Å¾e budÃº populÃ¡rne aj o pÃ¤Å¥sto rokov.
funFacts.en: Even though weâ€™ve never seen pomegranates or pineapples, they still give the altar its genuine luxurious spirit. I guess they will still be popular even five hundred years from now.

funFacts.sk: OvocnÃ© a rastlinnÃ© ornamenty na pozlÃ¡tenom brokÃ¡tovanÃ­ poznÃ¡me hlavne z luxusnÃ½ch orientÃ¡lnych textÃ­liÃ­. Tieto pozadia dodÃ¡vajÃº obrazom nÃ¡dych vzneÅ¡enosti.
funFacts.en: Weâ€™ve seen fruity or herbal decorations on gold-plated brocade mostly in luxurious oriental fabrics. Such backgrounds give the paintings a real sense of nobility.

meta.imgSrcInstitution: DolnyÌ KubiÌn, OravskaÌ GaleÌria, O 1181 Majetok ZÌŒilinskeÌho SamospraÌvneho Kraja

funFacts.sk: AbstraktnÃ½ tapetovÃ½ vzor s listovÃ½mi kartuÅ¡ami je pouÅ¾itÃ½ aj na oltÃ¡ri v krÃ¡snom gemerskom kostole v ChyÅ¾nom.
funFacts.en: The abstract wallpaper pattern with the leafy cartridge is also used in the altar of the beautiful Gemer church in ChyÅ¾nÃ©.

meta.imgSrcTitle: Israhel Van Meckenem: Nesenie KriÌzÌŒa Z Cyklu VelÌŒkeÌ PasÌŒie (8/12)

funFacts.sk: Ak mÃ¡me na krajinu dostatok priestoru, vytvÃ¡rame veÄ¾kÃ© biblickÃ© scenÃ©rie a do pozadia vkladÃ¡me menÅ¡ie scÃ©nky. Stromy a pÃ¡sy lesa sa snaÅ¾Ã­me zobraziÅ¥ takmer realisticky.
funFacts.en: If we have enough time and space, we create great Biblical sceneries, and add smaller scenes to the background. We endeavour to depict trees and lines of forest almost lifelike.

meta.imgSrcInstitution: Budapest, SzeÌpmuÌ‹veÌszeti MuÌzeum / Magyar Nemzeti GaleÌria, ReÌgi Magyar GyuÌˆjtemeÌny, 184.b

funFacts.sk: Pri krajinnÃ½ch pozadiach sa nÃ¡m ako inÅ¡pirÃ¡cie osvedÄili tieÅ¾ ilustrovanÃ© cestopisy a kroniky sveta od nemeckÃ½ch autorov.
funFacts.en: Illustrated travelogues and chronicles of the world by German authors have served us as a great inspiration for landscape backgrounds.

meta.imgSrcInstitution: DolnyÌ KubiÌn, OravskaÌ GaleÌria, O 1181 Majetok ZÌŒilinskeÌho SamospraÌvneho Kraja

funFacts.sk: VÃ½tvarnÃ© nÃ¡pady nizozemskÃ½ch Äi franskÃ½ch krajinÃ¡rov sa do naÅ¡ej oblasti dostali zrejme cez KlÃ¡Å¡tor Å¡kÃ³tskych mnÃ­chov vo Viedni alebo maÄ¾by HlavnÃ©ho oltÃ¡ra sv. AlÅ¾bety v KoÅ¡iciach.
funFacts.en: Fine art ideas of Dutch and French landscape painters probably came to our area via the Monastery of Scottish monks in Vienna or the paintings of the Main Altar of St. Elisabeth in KoÅ¡ice.

meta.imgSrcInstitution: Budapest, SzeÌpmuÌ‹veÌszeti MuÌzeum / Magyar Nemzeti GaleÌria, ReÌgi Magyar GyuÌˆjtemeÌny, 184.a

funFacts.sk: Ako pozadie pouÅ¾Ã­vame jednoduchÃ½ interiÃ©r bez nÃ¡bytku alebo pahorkatÃº prÃ­rodnÃº krajinu. Krajina nemusÃ­ sÃºvisieÅ¥ s dejom ani s ostatnÃ½mi scÃ©nami oltÃ¡ra, pokiaÄ¾ celok vyzerÃ¡ dobre.
funFacts.en: We use a simple unfurnished interior or a hilly landscape as a background. The environment doesnâ€™t need to be related to the plot or other altar scenes if it looks good as a whole.

funFacts.sk: Pri postavÃ¡ch a gestÃ¡ch sa inÅ¡pirujeme populÃ¡rnymi grafickÃ½mi listami z Nemecka, naprÃ­klad od Martina Schongauera. NiektorÃ© figÃºry priam â€vystrihujemeâ€œ a prispÃ´sobujeme naÅ¡im potrebÃ¡m.
funFacts.en: For postures and gestures, we are inspired by popular graphic prints from Germany, for example the ones by Martin Schongauer. We sometimes even directly â€œcut outâ€ figures and adapt them to our needs.

funFacts.en: We tend to idealise female figures in our paintings; their faces are gorgeous even at greater age.

funFacts.sk: KeÄÅ¾e na oltÃ¡ri pracuje viacero maliarov naraz, jednotlivÃ© postavy sa od seba lÃ­Å¡ia Å¡tÃ½lom aj kvalitou spracovania. TvÃ¡re postÃ¡v niekedy recyklujeme, aby sme tvorbu urÃ½chlili.
funFacts.en: Since more painters are working on the altar at the same time, individual sculptures differ in style and quality of execution. We sometimes recycle faces of the figures to speed up the work.

funFacts.en: When composing figures, donâ€™t forget about contrast. We usually make the central character rather static, and surround it with more bold movements.

funFacts.en: Male figures are more realistic than female ones. Some â€“ saints for example â€“ even have individual features, almost portrait-like.
